CONSOLE ERROR: line 4: The XSS Auditor refused to execute a script in 'http://localhost:8000/security/xssAuditor/resources/echo-intertag.pl?charset=Big5&q=%3Cscript%3Ealert(/XS%81SS/)%3C/script%3E' because its source code was found within the request. The auditor was enabled as the server did not send an 'X-XSS-Protection' header.
